--- In gladiator@y..., dale.mertes@v... wrote:
> Hello, my fellow Gladiator players.
> 
> Well, DPH, my archer beat that level 208 of yours, but I had to 
> disable having to keep the faeries alive to win... However, after 
> playing it with my friend, we beat it WITH the faeries alive as a 
> condition, by having him make an ENEMY ghost and fear the heck out 
of 
> the faeries until they are stuck in a corner. Then I proceeded to 
own 
> the slimes with my Archer.
> 
> Just a few questions for you all, though:
> 
> 1) Is the Archer's explosive arrow fire rate supposed to be THAT 
> rediculous, or is it a bug?
> 
> 2) Why the heck did DPH create a level with (arbitrarily large 
> amount) of gold in it?

I was probably working on a way that in 2 scenarios that I could end 
up with a mega-character (experience level 100 or higher).

> 3) I'd like to see your unreleased scenarios, DPH... We'll see how 
> the Storm of Death prevails over them.

Hehehe.  I do not think that would be a wise idea.  Some of my 
unreleased scenarios resulted in . . . crashing the game [too much 
exprience gained, which is why I am for putting limits on Druids, 
Clerics, and Archmages).  I'll check to see if I have not deleted any 
of them, but I think I deleted them.  If I find any, hehehe, I might 
have to put them under the label of 'Scenarios of Doom'.

I am expecting my new PC to arrive on Wednesday.  It will be 1 
gigahertz clockspeed.  What speed setting should I choose for this 
game when playing on that PC?
